DESCRIPTION: When this card is played it's shuffled in the draw pile instead of being discarded.
This card is cleansed if the condition is satisfied while in hand, turning into a powerful card for the rest of the combat.
Creatures afflicted by Rot lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn Rot is increased by #b1.
Creatures afflicted by Decrepit suffer 1 extra damage from attacks for each stack. NL Each turn Decrepit is decreased by #b1.
